Definition.WordDefinition: Aztec, NM (city, FIPS 5780) Location: 36.82840 N, 108.00463 W Population (1990): 5479 (2158 housing units) Area: 10.3 sq km (land), 0.2 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 87410

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Aztec \Az"tec\, a. Of or relating to one of the early races in Mexico that inhabited the great plateau of that country at the time of the Spanish conquest in 1519. -- n. One of the Aztec race or people. [1913 Webster]
Aztec n : a member of the Nahuatl people who established an empire in Mexico that was overthrown by Cortes in 1519
